resources.string: CATLA Broadband Services is a subsidiary of CATLA IT and Engg Pvt Ltd. We aim to provide High Speed Internet connection (Fiber/Wireless) in and around Guwahati. Unlimited download/upload (No capping) at no extra cost.
Address : BMP complex (above SBI ATM) 1ST Floor Beltola, Near Puberun Club Beltola, Guwahati, Assam 781022
